page.title: 16WASHINGTON SCHOOL GAMES
page.content: In our area we play lots of games.We play 'CUT THE CABBAGE'.Three people are needed then a certain area is marked out.Two of the people hold hands and stretch out and then another player cuts through the middle with his hand.Both the players holding hands run to their equidistant marks and return.It is the first one back to their place,touches the cutters hand and shouts "Cut the cabbage"that becomes the winner.The loser now becomes the cutter and the first cutter becomes a racer.
